website_summaries.verdict: This out-of-the-ordinary vase makes an attractive accent piece for homes with primitive styling. If you want to use it with fresh flowers, you'll find the opening wide enough to put one in place.
pros: We we love this metal vase's pitcher design that pairs nicely with country-themed decor
French inscription adds a nice touch
Looks great with dried flowers, but can also be used with fresh bouquets when you use a liner
7.5-inch size is practical – not too big or too small
cons: Requires a liner or waterproof plastic bag if you want to display fresh flowers

website_summaries.verdict: An excellent accent piece that compliments different decor styles and is easy to use with a liner for fresh bouquets. Looks great with dried flowers, too.
pros: Combines a pitcher design with French inscription for a look that goes well with country or primitive home styles
Wide opening is perfect for adding a liner for your fresh-cut greenery and blooms
cons: Requires a liner, but it can easily be used with a waterproof bag
Metal is on the thin side

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase pitcher
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful vase pitcher and worked perfectly for what I wanted. It also came with five adorable wood elephant pencil holders for free. The vase shipped super quick with Amazon Prime and was well priced and well made. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vase along with the artificial lavender flowers as an accent in a lavender-themed bathroom; I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Toyofuku

customer_reviews.title: Great vase.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then I thought. Love the rustic blue color. Thin metal and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Sevilla

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Leaking
customer_reviews.text: This vase leaks like crazy. Bought this to fill with water and flowers as part of an anniversary gift, and within half a minute my table was soaked due to shoddy sealing. What’s the point of a vase or pitcher if you can even put water in it?
customer_reviews.author: Clarkhays

customer_reviews.title: Came bent
customer_reviews.text: It was not bubble wrapped and so It arrived bent and creased. Much smaller and not worth the price. Very unhappy. I just added water and it leaks everywhere!!!! Cant even use it as a vase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Still gave it 4 stars because the one that I did receive is also nice.
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars but I did not recieve the size and color that I ordered. The pitcher vase that I received was a few inches smaller and lighter. Still gave it 4 stars because the one that I did receive is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and pretty color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! Good sturdy quality and looks so nice. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Can easily be used in several different rooms
customer_reviews.text: The color and size is perfect for the location I chose to place it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wentzel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, thought it would be heavier but still love it
customer_reviews.author: Ledawn

customer_reviews.title: Not just your ordinary vase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Metal Jug Vase! Made well and a beautiful color!
customer_reviews.author: L.Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Very thin metal , cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This vase is made very cheap to say the least ! Only worth about 5.00 at the most not 20.00 !! Go to charismas tree shop and they have very nice ones with all the decorations already set up on it , much Havier gauge steel construction all for only 10.00 !!!
customer_reviews.author: lioness

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & Interesting Metal Vase
customer_reviews.text: We recently remodeled a room in our house into a Guest room. I wanted a soft, shabby chic style. The furniture is an ivory wood, & the walls are a pale silvery blue. This metal jug/vase paired with some artificial lavender and clock make such a warm and inviting statement. Very well made and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: I. Fuhrmann

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size and is adorable
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size and is adorable....my artificial and real flowers look great in it.....so much that I immediately purchased another one....
customer_reviews.author: Susan Geffner

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but for decorative purposes only
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking but if you are looking to use it as a case with water this is not your product. (It does have disclaimer that product is not meant to hold water..FYI)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but took a star off because it took almost 2 months to receive the product.
customer_reviews.author: Em C

customer_reviews.title: Leak Leak Leak
customer_reviews.text: Very bummed when I put flowers in the pitcher then added water and it leaked all out.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Brindley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: In love with this,very pretty god material perfect for a farm house deco
customer_reviews.author: Eugenio

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This is a terrible, cheaply made product. It arrived dented, I decided to let that go and put flowers in there, it started leaking immediately. This is a cheap piece of crap. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: ieg
